summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2190, for the improvement of the alley in block 46, of Pontius' Addition to the City of Seattle, being the alley from Thomas Street to Harrison Street and between Summit Avenue and Belmont Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same, under Ordinance No. 21749 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
